attributes.action: FORCE CARS INTO DRIVES TO STOP GRID LOCKED ROADS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: DEAR SIR, WE THE UNDER SIGNED WOULD LIKE TO SEE CARS FORCED FROM THE ROADS WHERE THERE IS A DRIVEWAY, THIS WOULD MAKE IT A LACK OF A PROBLEM FOR THE EMERGENCY SERVICES AND ALSO CLEAR THE ROADS, THERE WILL COME A TIME NOT FAR AWAY WHERE TRAFFIC CAN NOT GET THROUGH AND LIVES COULD BE LOST, THIS ALSO APPLIES TO BAD PARKING ON THE FOOTPATHS WHICH IS GETTING OUT OF HAND IN PLACES AND CAUSES ISSUES WITH PEOPLE ON FOOT.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
